html:
Fear of uncertainty makes sense from an evolutionary perspective but can be unnecessarily nerve-wracking in our modern world.

Fortunately, we have also evolved an ability that’s deeply human: metacognition, which can help us better navigate the unknown 🧭
https://t.co/94jSLmEtcz
